author: Wilsker
body: of channel errors per FED ID. Removed modules from 'process.InitialStepPreSplittingTask' so online client doesnt crash due to trying to override definition of siPixelClusters while it is used by the task InitialStepPreSplittingTask. Added global switch to online clients to enable trend plots of channel errors per FED ID.
title: Switch fed error trend online client
